Name: 1BIT CASTLE
About the game: WISHLIST MY NEXT GAME / 1BIT CASTLE is a little tower defense game in which we are defending castle from the monsters. 4 heroes separated in two categories: close combat​ berzerker knight spellcasting​ wizard mage 5 monsters with their strong and weak points: bat squid ghost skeleton golem Carefully crafted art and sound pixelart by Kenney.nl​ retro soundtrack of 6 tracks (including menu theme) crt effects (scanlines and chromatic post process)
